properties.markdownProperty:
Export strategies can be added via plugins. They must inherit from `ExportStrategy` (`proteus.application.export_strategy`) abstract class.
The export strategies consist in a widget that will act as a form and an export method that will be called when export button is triggered. It also contains signals to control the export progress, form validation and export outcome.
Check export strategies implemented in proteus core plugin `basics` for an example.
